subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The World Cup crossed most of its ideological divides when Brazil, the No. 1 soccer nation of the last 50 years, played North Korea, whose team has played at this level only twice in that span.
snippet: The World Cup crossed most of its ideological divides when Brazil, the No. 1 soccer nation of the last 50 years, played North Korea, whose team has played at this level only twice in that span.
